results.name: Wake Up - The story of Amanda Hargrave
Heaven - Epic Game Jam 2022 - As Above, So Below

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Graphics settings menu
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Graphics settings menu

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) or Windows 10 (64-bit) or Mac OS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300 @3.1GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 460 / Radeon 6870 / Intel HD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:

  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) or Mac OS Catalina
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 3.3GHz / AMD FX 8350 4.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 4GB VRAM / AMD R9 280 3GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
